column2: title= JRR Tolkien e a crítica à modernidade

column1: '''''J.R.R. Tolkien e a crítica à modernidade''''' is a Brazilian academic book written by Paulo Cristelli.<ref>{{webcite
column3: articlename=JRR Tolkien e a crítica a modernidade

column2: Relying on autobiographical material represented by the letters of Tolkien and important theorists of literature and the social sciences, Paul Cristelli makes it clear that Tolkienian fiction springs actually the great crises of the twentieth century: the mechanized wars, genocides scale unprecedented environmental destruction and accelerated by the successive phases of the Industrial Revolution.}}
